ParseDocument.title: 文档解析示例

ParseDocumentAsync.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: es.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ParseDocumentAsync
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Document": {
        "FileType": "TXT",
        "FileUrl": "",
        "FileContent": "data:text/plain;base64,SGVsbG8sIFdvcmxkIQ==",
        "FileName": "test.txt"
    },
    "ModelName": "doc-llm"
}
ParseDocumentAsync.title: 文件解析异步任务

RunRerank.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: es.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: RunRerank
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ModelName": "bge-rerank-large",
    "Query": "你好",
    "Documents": [
        "你好？",
        "你好。"
    ]
}
RunRerank.title: 重排序
